node.text:
The Cafe at The Raviz Kovalam that caters to the Club residents is an all-day multi-cuisine restaurant with sophisticated, modern interiors as well as intimate gazebos perched on the cliff-face.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 6691111 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations@theraviz.com
